attributes.action: dismiss Alan Johnson from the position of Home Secretary, and to set up a politically independent body to determine the classification of controlled drugs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Both Alan Johnson and his predecessor, Jacqui Smith, have proved themselves to be incapable of accepting objective scientific evidence on the classification of drugs.
This is unacceptable, since the public are entitled to expect accurate information of the relative dangers of controlled drugs, and for this information to be duly reflected in the law of the land.
We therefore call upon the Prime Minister to dismiss Alan Johnson from his present position as Home Secretary. We also insist that in future the classification of controlled drugs be determined by a politically independent body in the same way that the National Institute of Clinical Excellence assesses the safety of prescription drugs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
